title: Inside Miles Teller and Keleigh Sperry's Maui wedding
text:
'Whiplash" star Miles Teller tied the knot on Sunday in Hawaii, marrying his girlfriend of six years, Keleigh Sperry.

Vogue reports the ceremony took place in a Catholic church in Maui, with the reception at the Ritz Carlton Kapalua Hotel. DJ Kygo emceed the after party.

Sperry wore a custom dress by Monique Lhuillier, while Teller wore a bespoke suit by Hedi Slimane.

Teller's brand-new wife posted Instagram pics of the happy event, showing the new couple and their guests celebrating on the dance floor. Actresses Nina Dobrev and Shailene Woodley were among the celebrants.

The couple apparently jetted off to Capri, Italy, according to Sperry's Instagram, which displayed a romantic picture of herself and her new hubby in a boat, smooching under a rock formation.

"40 more years in love if you kiss under a cave," she wrote.
